diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Nucleoside analog reverse transcriptase inhibitor-associated ototoxicity in HIV-1 infected patients
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: All patients had a history of noise-induced hearing loss that reportedly worsened in association with tinnitus during antiretroviral therapy. The evidence suggests an association between NRTIs and ototoxicity in older HIV-1-infected patients, with mitochondrial toxicity proposed as a possible mechanism.
